sqlMap.select: select * from DC_GPS_HIS where TMN_CODE = #tmnKey:VARCHAR# and REPORT_TIME = #rptTime:DECIMAL#
select * from DC_GPS_HIS where TMN_CODE = #tmnKey:VARCHAR# and REPORT_TIME >=20110901000000 and REPORT_TIME <20110919000000
select * from DC_GPS_HIS where TMN_ALIAS = #tmnAlias:VARCHAR# and REPORT_TIME >= #queryStartTime:VARCHAR# and REPORT_TIME <#queryEndTime:VARCHAR# order by REPORT_TIME ASC
sqlMap.insert: insert into DC_GPS_HIS (TMN_CODE, TMN_ALIAS, REPORT_TIME, LOGIT, LAT, SPEED, ANGLE, HEIGHT,GSM_SIGN, GPS_SATL,STATE LOC_DESC, ZCODE, GPS_TYPE,PRECISION, LOGIT_OFFSET, LAT_OFFSET) values (#tmnKey:VARCHAR#, #tmnAlias:VARCHAR#, #rptTime:DECIMAL#, #lon:DECIMAL#, #lat:DECIMAL#, #speed:VARCHAR#, #dire:VARCHAR#, #altitude:VARCHAR#, #gsmSign:VARCHAR#, #satlSign:VARCHAR#, #state:VARCHAR#, #locDesc:VARCHAR#, #zCode:VARCHAR#, #gpsType:VARCHAR#,#precision:VARCHAR#, #lonOff:DECIMAL#,#latOff:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update DC_GPS_HIS set LOC_DESC = #locDesc:VARCHAR# where TMN_CODE = #tmnKey:VARCHAR# and REPORT_TIME = #rptTime:DECIMAL#
